title: BARC Notification 2026 - Apply Online for 21 Scientific Officer, Technical Officer Posts
description: The Bhabha Atomic Research Centre (BARC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 21 Scientific Officer and Technical Officer Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, MD/MS, DNB, BDS, or post-graduation can apply for the BARC Notification 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details,...
